( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.'' were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN.`` It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had.'' Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.
